document_data.mainbody:
Paddo Garrard was a builder and city wall repairman from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Paddo was a human man with tan light skin, and icy blue eyes. He wore a simple blue worksmans tunic and a cloth skullcap.
In the , Paddo Garrard could be found in the Lower City, working on the city walls alongside Tamrin and Buntter.
